text: fman jadlk -ayha alrswl- fi almasih eisaa abn maryam min baed ma ja'ak min aleilm fi 'amr eisaa ealayh alslam, faqul lhm: taealawa nuhdir 'abna'ana wabna'km, wanisa'ana wnsa'km, wa'anfusana wanfskm, thuma ntjh 'iilaa allah baldea' 'an yunzl eqwbth wlenth ealaa alkadhibin fi qwlhm, almsrrin ealaa enadhm
